summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by adding a new service option labeled exactly “Criminal defense” to the Contact form’s ServiceSelectorAccordion; selection logic already closes the accordion and propagates the value via onChange. No backend or immutable-path changes are shown. Two meta/project files were modified without being requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added meta documentation content in frontend-file-summaries.txt (not requested as part of adding a service option).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to add a new selectable service option in the Contact Us form; it does not request updating summary/documentation files.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project_state.json to add/track feature requests (AR-1/AR-2) and statuses.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request changes to project tracking/state files; only UI option addition was requested.
